pages.text: After a mad captain's ship was sunk, he and a few surviving crew members built a new one from the wreckage. Determined to take revenge, they installed a crudly built missile, gunpowder storage and a massive block of crude TNT. The next time they lose, they'll make sure there's no winner either.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/missile)$(l)Crude Missile/$$(br)Vendetta fires its crude missle, $(l)dealing 3 damage/$ to whatever it hit. This ability has $(l)1 Use/$ and costs $(l)12 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/retaliation)$(l)Self Destruct/$$(br)$(l)Upon being destroyed/$, Vendetta's gunpowder storage explodes. The detonation violently rips apart the ship and sends the block of TNT flying, $(l)dealing 2 damage to a random opponent ship/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
